segments.text: The kitchen looks ordinary at first, with the woman at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, towel in hand, concentrating hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's pouring water, and the basin's overflowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a sheet of water down to the floor puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get wet soon if she doesn't turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on the stool, body stretched to the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, but the stool's splayed out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One push and he'll topple backward onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, palm up, eagerly waiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cute how they're teaming up for the treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the wet floor adds real danger to their play.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden path and bushes are so orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the mischief will end in tears or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes nearby could crash if there's a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic moment feels fragile, on the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR
